official_title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 304 West Commercial Avenue, Monterey, Tennessee, as the "J.E. (Eddie) Russell Post Office".

summary.text: Designates the United States Post Office building at 304 West Commercial Avenue in Monterey, Tennessee, as the J.E. (Eddie) Russell Post Office.
